headline:
Owek. Mayiga akuutidde abavubuka ku buyiiya n’obumalirivu. 
         Kamalabyonna Charles Peter Mayiga akuutidde abavubuka wonna mu ggwanga okubeera abayiiya, abagumiikiriza, era abeesimbu bwebaba baagala okugenda mu maaso basobole okwekalakaanya Entanda Katikkiro Mayiga agiwadde bw’abadde asisinkanye abavubuka abakulisitaayo okuva mu matendekero ag’enjawulo abeegattira mu kibiina ki National Christian Association...

Aba NUP balumirizza aba NRM ku by’okulumba woofiisi zaabwe e Gulu. 
     Bannakibiina kya National Unity Platform(NUP) bavuddeyo ne balumiriza ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza ekya National Resisitance Movement ku by’okulumba woofiisi zaabwe olwaleero mu kibuga Gulu  Okusinziira ku mwogezi w’ekibiina kino, Joel Ssenyonyi, bw’abadde ayogerako eri bannamawulire, ategeezezza nti obulumbaganyi n’effujjo ebikoleddwa ku woofiisi yaabwe bwe bikulembeddwamu eyaliko omukulembeze mu kibiina kya NUP, Tonny Olenge ng’ono yasala dda eddiiro ne yeegatta ku kibiina kya NRM...

‘Quarter Final’ z’ekikopo ky’Amasaza ya Ssande eno – Omuk. Ssejjengo. 
           Olukiiko oluddukanya emipiira gy’ Amasaza mu Buganda, lutegeezezza nga oluzannya lwa ‘Quarter Finals’ olwali luyimiriziddwa, lugenda luzannyibwa ku Ssande eno Kino kirangiriddwa Ssentebe w’olukiiko oluddukanya empaka zino, Sulaiman Ssejjengo mu lukung’aana lwa bannamawulire ku Lwokubiri e Bulange Mmengo...

Mubuulire abantu gavumenti by’ekoze okubataasa ku bulimba bwa Opozisoni – Museveni. 
      Kampala Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni asabye ababaka okubuulira abalonzi ebintu bye basobodde okukolera  eggwanga nga National Resistance Movement (NRM), kiyambe okukendeeza ku bulimba obutambuzibwa ab’oludda oluvuganyaWadde emabegako Pulezidenti Museveni yali yategeeza nga bw’ateeteega kubuulira bantu Birungi NRM byekoze, yeefukuludde eggulo ku Mmande n’asaba bannaNRM okulaga ensi ebikoleddwa gavumenti ye...

Ssaabasajja Kabaka asiimye okulabikako eri Obuganda ng’atongoza empaka z’Ebika. 
        Ssaabasajja Kabaka, Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II asiimye okulabikako eri Obuganda nga aggulawo empaka z’Ebika bya Buganda, nga 28th May 2022, ku kisaawe kya Kasana – Luweero mu Bulemeezi Bino byogeddwa Minista w’Abavubuka, Ebyemizannyo n’Okwewummuzaamu Owek...

Bannayuganda Abalala Baakuddamu Okuzzibwa Mu Ggwanga. 
      Minisitule evunaanyizibwa ku nsonga z’ebweru erangiridde nti yakuddamu okuleeta bannayuganda abakonkomalidde mu mawanga amalala olwekirwadde kya coronavirus Enteekateeka eno yayimirizibwa ssabiiti bbiri emabega...

Abakazi baleseewo obufumbo ne bagenda ku byeyo – Alipoota. 
     Minisitule y’ekikula ky’abantu n’enkulaakulana yaabwe, etegeezezza ng’omuwendo gw’abasajja abeemulugunya ku bakyala baabwe ababadduseeko ne bagenda okukuba ekyeyo mu mawanga g’Abawarabu bwe gweyongedde Okusinziira ku Ministule eno, okwemulugunya kuno okusingakuva mu basajja abawangaalira mu byalo era nga bagamba nti tebalina kye bamanyi abakyala baabwe gye bali, ekintu ekireeseewo okwekyawa mu baami bano nga weetaaga okubaawo ekikolebwa...

Bobi Wine akunze abawangaalira ebweru okwenyigira mu kukyusa obuyinza. 
     Pulezidenti w’ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi aka Bobi Wine, ategeezezza nti obuvunaanyizibwa bwa bannayuganda abawangaalira ebweru bulina okuggumizibwa n’okwongerwamu amaanyi Kyagulanyi yagambye nti gwe mulundi ogusookedde ddala, okulaba nga bannayuganda ebweru bonna beenyigidde butereevu mu nsonga z’okununula eggwanga lyabwe...

Kyagulanyi asabye ab’e Tanzania okumuyamba aggyeko Museveni. 
      Pulezidenti w’ekibiina ki National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi, amanyiddwa nga Bobi Wine asabye ekibiina ekivuganya gavumenti mu Tanzania ki Demokrasia na Maendeleo (CHADEMA) okubayambako okuggyako obukulembeze bwa Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni Kyagulanyi okusaba kuno akukoze ku Lwakuna bweyabadde ayogerera mu Ttabamiruka w’ekibiina ki CHADEMA gyeyayitiddwa ng’omugenyi omukulu...

Okukuza olunaku lwa White Canes mu Buganda.. 
     Obwakabaka bwa Buganda buwagidde enteekateeka y’okukuza olunaku lwa international white canes n’obuuma obweyambisibwa abalema okutambula amakumi ataano Owekitiibwa Kyewalabye Male nga akwas Ssentebe wa ba muzibe emigo (White canes)...

Christopher Aine agudde mu bintu; Museveni amulonze okumyuka RDC w’e Mbarara. 
     Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni alonze Christopher Aine, okubeera omumyuka w’omubaka wa Pulezidenti e Mbarara Aine nga ye yali akulira ebyokwerinda bye yali Ssaabaminisita era eyavuganya ku kalulu k’Obwapulezidenti aka 2021, John Patrick Amama Mbabazi, kati agenda kumyukaLt...

Ab’e Kira batandise okulwanyisa Corona ku mikolo gy’okuziika. 
             Kampala  Abakulembeze mu Munisipaali y’e Kira, batandise kaweefube w’okwongera okutangira ensaasaana y’ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona naddalaku mikolo egikung’aanya abantu abangi omuli okuziika Omu ku batuula ku kakiiko akalwanyisa Corona mu Kira, Lubega Hussein, ategeezezza nti ekiseera kituuse abantu bafunirwe ebyambalo ebikozesebwa okuziika abafudde Corona, kiyambe okutangira obulwadde buno era n’okukendeeza ku ssente obulindo ezisasulwa kkampuni eziziika ababeera bafudde Corona...

COVID-19: Poliisi eyongedde amaanyi mukukwata abajeemera ebiragiro bya Museveni. 
     Luke Oweyesigire ayogerera poliisi y’e Kampala n’emirirwano Poliisi ya Uganda eyongedde amaanyi mu bikwekweto okukwata abo bonna abajeemera ebiragiro by’Omukulembeze w’eggwanga ku kulwanyisa ekirwadde kya senyiga owa COVID-19  Olwaleero, poliisi ekutte abasomesa 53 eb’essomero lya Daffodil erisangibwa e Naggulu wamu n’abalala 23 aba Kabojja Junior school erisangibwa e Kamwokya...

Bannalotale beyanzizza Beene olw’okukyuusa embeera z’abantu. 
       Kampala Bannalotale abeegattira mu disitulikiti etwala Uganda ne Tanzania nga bakulembedwamu abe Mmengo bawadde Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II ejjinja ery’omuwendo okumusiima olw’okukyuusa embeera z’abantu mu Buganda Bano eyanzizza Ssaabasajja Kabaka olw’okusiima nakwata omumuli gw’okulwanyisa ekirwadde kya Mukenenya ng’ali wamu n’ekitongole ekivunaanyizibwa ku kulwanyisa Mukenenya mu nsi yonna ekya UNAIDS...

FDC eyagala ebyemizannyo byawulwe ku by’enjigiriza. 
       Kampala  Ekibiina kya Forum for Democratic Change (FDC) kisabye gavumenti eyawule Minisitule y’ebyenjigiriza ku by’emizannyo okusobola okubiwa ensimbi ezimala n’okutumbula ebitone Bano kino baakiyisizza mu amyuka omwogezi w’ekibiina, John Kikonyogo,bwe yabadde ayogerako eri bannamawulire ku Mmande n’ategeeza nti eno yeemu ku ngeri gavumenti gy’eyinza okulaga nti efaayo ku by’emizannyo...

Owek. Kaawaase alaze ensi yonna engeri Buganda gyekuttemu olutalo lwa Mukenenya. 
      Omumyuka wa Katikkiro Asooka, era Minisita Avunaanyizibwa ku Nzirukanya y’Emirimu; Tekinologiya n’Obuyiiya, Oweek Prof...

4 bavudde mu lwokaano lwa Lubaga South, balekedde Mukaaku. 
     Bya Gladys Nanyombi Lubaga Akalulu katuuse wekanyumira, abeesimbyewo  mu lwokaano lw’omubaka wa Lubaga South mu Palamenti abawera bana, basazeewo okuwagira munnakibiina ki National Unity Platform (NUP) Samuel Walter Lubega Mukaaku ku kifo kino Mukaaku wamu n’abamwegasseeko Bano okuli; Joel Yiga, Masembe Moses, Ssemusu Mugobansonga ne Denis Kiyingi bategeezezza olupapula luno olwa Gambuuze nti, beetunuddemu nebalaba nga Mukaaku abasinza obuwagizi era ajja kusobola okutuusayo ensonga zabwe...

Balonze ebisaawe omunaazannyirwa egy’Amasaza. 
     Olukiiko oluddukanya empaka z’omupiira gw’amasaza lutegeezezza nti lulonze ebisaawe emipiira mwe gigenda okusambibwa wakati mu kwekuuma ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona Akulira akakiiko Sulaiman Ssejjengo Okusinziira ku ssentebe w’olukiiko luno, Sulaiman Ssejjengo, olukalala lw’ebisaawe ebigenda okukozesebwa sizoni eno bamaze okubiweereza mu kibiina ekiddukanya omupiira mu ggwanga ekya FUFA era nga basuubira nti mu bwangu bigenda kulambulwa...

Gavumenti erabudde abatandise okuleeta obukubagano mu kulonda. 
      Kampala Gavumenti erabudde ku bantu abatandise okukola obuvuyo n’okuleeta obukubagano mu kalulu ka 2021 nti tebagenda kubakkiriza kutabangula mirembe Minisita Betty Amongi Okulabula kuno kukoleddwa Minisita wa Kampala Betty Amongi leero ku Lwokusatu ku Media Centre mu Kampala bwabadde ayogerako eri bannamawulire, nategeeza nti nga abakulira ekibuga tebagenda kutunula butunuzi nga bannabyabufuzi batabangula emirembe...

Ssemujju Nganda :  “Eby’okuwa Oulanyah obutwa biraga bannaansi tebakyesiga gavumenti “. 
     Omwogezi w’ekibiina ki ‘Forum for Democratic Change(FDC)’, Ibrahim Ssemujju Nganda, ategeezezza nti gavumenti eri mubuyinza okuggwamu ensa kye kireese abantu okugirumiriza buli kimu omuli nebyo byetakoze Ebigambo bino Ssemujju yabyogeredde wakati nga abamu ku bantu bagenda mu maaso n’okukakasa nga abadde Sipiika Jacob Oulanyah bweyaweebwa obutwa wadde kino Nganda akiwakanya...

Palamenti ejaguza emyaka 100, emirimu gy’ababaka bannansi bagitankana. 
      Kampala Olwaleero giweze emyaka 100 bukya Palamenti ya Uganda etondebwawo mu 1921 era omumyuka akulira eby’amawulire n’empuliziganya mu Palamenti, Hellen Kaweesa, agamba nti mukakafu ku kya Palamenti okunyweza enfuga eya demokulaasiya emyaka 100 egiyise  Ebikujjuko bino bikwatiddwa mu ngeri ya kimpowooze olw’ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona ekikyalemesezza abantu okukung’aana...

Owek.  Nsibirwa asiimiddwa ekkanisa olw’okugiyamba okulaakulana. 
     Abakulembeze b’ekkanisa ya Uganda mu bulabirizi bwe Namirembe basiimye omumyuka ow’okubiri owa KatikkiroOwek Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa olw’okugiyambako mu nteekateeka z’okutumbula eby’obulimi awamu n’okutumbula ekirime ky’ Emmwanyi...

Emmwanyi Terimba : Uganda ekwata kyamusanvu mu nsi ezirima emmwanyi. 
     Uganda erinnyerinye mu nsi ezisinga okulima emmwanyi nga kati ekwata kifo kyamusanvu ku nsi ekumi ezisinga okulima emmwanyi mu nsi yonna Ekyama kino kyabikuddwa Ssenkulu wa Uganda Coffee Development Authority, Dr...

Abavubuka e Kkooki batendereza Obwakabaka ku kulwanyisa Mukenenya. 
       Rakai – Kooki Abavubuka abawangaalira mu ssaza lya Ssaabasajja Kabaka e Kkooki batenderezza Omutanda olwa kaweefube gw’aliko okulaba ng’akawuka ka Mukenenya kafuuka lufumo mu ggwanga ng’ayita mu nkola y’ebyoto eyategekeddwa ku magombolola okubangula abavubuka ku ngeri gye bayinza okulwanyisa ssaako n’okwewala obulwadde buno Okwogera bino baasinzidde ku kyalo Luteebe  mu muluka gw’e Kanoni mu ggombolola ya Mumyuka Lwanda mu distulikiti y’e Rakai mu ssaza lya Ssaabasajja Kabaka ery’e Kkooki ku mukolo gw’ekyoto ekyalangiriddwa Obwakabaka bwa Buganda okukolebwa mu masaza 18 agakola Obwakabaka n’ekigendererwa eky’okulwanyisa Siriimu...

Mao wakuddamu okuzimba DP. 
      Balintuma Ssenkaggale w’ekibiina ki ‘Democratic Party (DP)’ Nobert Mao, ategeezezza nga ekibiina bwekyakosebwa olw’ ababaka 11 kwabo 15 bekirina okusala eddiiro nebadda mu kibiina ki ‘National unity Platform (NUP)’ wabula bakola buli kimu bano okubazzaawo Mao nga alayiza abamu ku bakulembeze abaggya Bwabadde ku kitebe ky’ekibiina e Balintuma – Mmengo mu Kampala ku Lwokubiri, Mao agambye nti agenda kukozesa amaanyi gonna galina okuddamu okuzimba DP...

Abakozi ba disitulikiti 4 e Masaka bakwatiddwa Ssennyiga Corona. 
      Masaka Abakozi ba disitulikiti ye Masaka bana bazuuliddwamu ekirwadde ki COVID-19 Kino kyabikuddwa akulira eddwaliro lya Masaka Regional Referral Hospital Nathan Onyachi nategeeza nti abana bano batandise dda okujjanjabibwa...

Bapulezidenti 21 be bagenda okubaawo nga M7 alayira. 
      Kampala Abakulembeze b’amawanga abawerera ddala 21 be bakakasizza okwetaba ku mukolo gw’okulayiza Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni ku kisanja kye ekyomukaaga Okusinziira ku Minisita w’ensonga z’obwapulezidenti, Esther Mbayo, baakwetaba ku mukolo guno ogugenda okubaawo wiiki ejja ku kisaawe e Kololo...

Abamenye ekkanisa mu Ndeeba  mutukoze bubi -Omulabirizi Luwalira. 
     Ekkanisa ya St Peter’s mu Ndeeba Ndeeba Omulabirizi we Namirembe ...

Ssaabalabirizi asabye  abantu okukuuma emirembe. 
      Kampala Ssaabalabirizi w’ekkanisa ya Uganda, Dr Stephen Kazimba Mugalu, asabye abantu mu ggwanga okukuuma emirembe naddala mu kaseera kano ak’okunoonya akalulu...

Katikkiro ayanjudde olukiiko olunabbulula emipiira gy’Ebika. 
      Katikkiro wa Buganda Owek Charles Peter Mayiga, ayanjulidde Obuganda olukiiko olugenda okuzza endasi mu mipiira gy’Ebika...

Abakozi ba Palamenti 5 basangiddwamu Corona. 
     Abakozi bataano mu lukiiko lw’eggwanga olukulu bataano basangiddwamu ekirwadde ki Ssennyiga Corona  Okusinziira ku amyuka akulira eby’amawulire ku Palamenti Hellen Kaweesa, kino bakizudde oluvanyuma lw’okusalawo okukebera abakozi mu kizimbe kino...

Abayiseemu mu Bukomansimbi basabiddwa okwewala entalo. 
     Ssentebe wa distulikiti y’e Bukomansimbi, Muhammad Kateregga, akalaatidde abakulembeze abayiseemu mu kitundu kino okwewala entalo naye beegatte bakolere abantu ababalonze awatali kusosola Ssentebe Kateregga nga alambuza abakulembeze abaggya  Kateregga okwogera bino abadde asisinkanye abakulembeze abaggya ku kitebe kya disitulikiti y’e Bukomansimbi okubalambika mu ebyo bye boolekedde mu bukulembeze bwabwe ssaako okubalaga ebituukiddwako...

Muwada Mawejje agenze mu Police F.C. 
    Oluvanyuma  lwa Ttiimu ya Police FC okuwonera ku kaguwa okusalwako mu Uganda Premier League mu sizoni ya 2019/2020, kati ekola buli kimu okulaba nga yenywezza...

Bobi Wine ne Dr Besigye bakkaanyiza okukolera awamu,  bagamba akalulu kamala budde. 
     Abanene ku ludda oluvuganya gavumenti okuli Dr Kizza Besigye, Asuman Basaalirwa, Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu n’abalala bakkaanyiza okukolera awamu balwanyise ebikolwa by’okubba akalulu ebyeyambisibwa gavumenti okwenywereza mu buyinza...

Oweek. Nsibirwa aweereddwa engule olw’okuwagira okulima emmwanyi. 
        Omumyuka wa Katikkiro ow’okubiri, Oweek Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa asiimiddwa era n’aweebwa engule olw’emirimu gyakoze mukutumbula ekirime ky’emmwanyi mu ggwanga n’okwetooloola ensi yonna...

Janet alumirizza abavuganya gavumenti okuba emabega w’okwekalakasa e Makerere. 
        Janet Museveni, muk’omukulembeze w’eggwanga era minisita w’ebyenjigiriza n’ebyemizannyo, alumirizza abavuganya gavumenti okubeera emabega w’akeegugungo mu ssetendekero e Makerere kati akanyingidde olunaku lw’omukaaga Mubbaluwa gyawandiise nga esoose kufulumira mu lupapula lwa gavumenti olwa New Vision, Janet Museveni yagambye nti balina amawulire agalaga anti abo abekalakaasa sibayizi be Makerere oba ssetendekero endala yonna wabula bantu abasasulwa bannabyabufuzi okuleetawo obujagalalo muggwanga...

Amerika erabudde ab’ebyokwerinda abaatyobodde eddembe ly’abantu mu kalulu ka 2021. 
      Omwogezi w’ekitongole kya Amerika ekivunaanyizibwa ku nsonga ez’ebweru ekya ‘Department of State’ Ned Price,’ ategeezezza nti bagenda kufuna engeri gye bakola ku bantu bonna abeenyigidde mu kutyoboola eddembe ly’obuntu mu kalulu akaakubwa nga January 14 Museveni ne Kyagulanyi bakyattunka Bino Price yabyogedde ayogerako ne bannamawulire ng’abuuzibwa ku nsonga ya Pulezidenti wa National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi, okuggyayo omusango ng’alumiriza abalamuzi okubeera ne kyekubiira...

Omuliro gusaanyizzaawo bya bukadde e Katabi. 
     Omuliro nga gutuuntumuka URN Omuliro gukutte negusaanyaawo ebbajjiro mu kabuge ke Katabi ku luguudo lwe Entebbe ebintu ebibalirwamu obukadde 150 nebisirikka Ebbajjiro lino libaddemu entebe, ebitanda, emeeza n’ebintu ebirala...

Minisita Nabakooba anokoddwayo mwabo abaalyazaamanya poliisi. 
     Tumwebaze ng’akwasa Nabakooba woofiisi  Minisita omuggya mu gavumenti eyawakati akola ku nsonga za tekinologiya era omubaka omukyala akiikirira disitulikiti y’e Mityana mu palamenti Judith Nabakooba anokoddwayo ng’omu kubantu abalamereddwa okusasula ssente zeyeewola okuva mukittavvu kya Poliisi  Nabakooba yali mwogezi wa poliisi eyawummulira ku ddaala lya kamisona era nga yeesimbawo mu 2016 okuvuganya ku kifo kya palamenti kyeyawangula...

Ab’e Bukomansimbi balabuddwa ku ssente z’emyoga, tujja kubasiba. 
       Bukomansimbi – Buddu Abantu ba Kabaka abawangaalira mu disitulikiti y’e Bukomansimbi balabuddwa ku nsimbi z’emyoga singa banaazikozesa obubi nti abamu baakufundikira nga bali mu makomera kuba ensimbi zino si zaakulya wabula okwekulaakulanya Okulabula kuno kukoleddwa akulira ekitongole  kya Micro-Finance Support Centre mu bbendobendo ly’e Masaka,  Katobe Wilfreds,  bw’abadde abangula abatuuze ba Bukomansimbi North ne South ku nteekateeka eno ku kitebe kya disitulikiti...

WORLD CUP | Senegal  yeesoose okuva mukibinja mu z’Afirika. 
        Ttiimu y’eggwanga lya Senegal emanyiddwa nga ‘The Lions of Teranga’ bakoze ebyafaayo bwebafuuse ttiimu y’ Africa esoose okuva mu kibinja mu mpaka z’omupiira eza World Cup 2022 eziyindira e Qatar Senegal mu kibinja evuddemu nga ttiimu ekutte eky’okubiri mu kibinja A ekikulembeddwa Netherlands, eno yakubye omutegesi Qatar ne Equador mu mupiira ogubaddeko n’obugombe...

Masaza Cup 2021 : Butambala ekubye Buweekula 1-0, Busujju ne Mawogola bagudde maliri 1-1. 
    Empaka z’amasaza ga Buganda zizzeemu okutojjera ku kisaawe kya FUFA Technical Centre e Njeru nga Butambala ebadde ezannya ne Buweekula ate Mawogola ng’etunka ne Busujju okutangaaza emikisa gyabwe egy’okuva mu kibinja kya Muganzirwazza  Ogusoosewo gubadde wakati wa Mawogola ne Busujju era nga gugweredde mu maliri ga ggoolo 1-1...

Ebbula ly’amafuta: Gavumenti yaakweddiza amatekero g’amafuta agasangibwa mu Jinja. 
     Gavumenti erangiridde nga bw’egenda okwezza emirimu gyonna egikwatana ku materekero g’amafuta agali mu kibuga Jinja okusobola okutaasa eggwanga mu kaseera k’aatyabaga Alangiridde kino ye muteesiteesi omukulu mu minisitule y’ebyamasannyalaze n’obugagga obw’omu ttaka, Eng...

FDC eyagala wabeewo okunnoonyereza ku bantu abattibwa e Karamoja. 
     Pulezidenti w’ekibiina ki Forum for Democratic Change(FDC), Patrick Oboi Amuriat asabye gavumenti ennoonyereze ku bigambibwa nti abamu ku b’ebyokwerinda beekobana n’ababbi b’ente mukitundu kye Karamoja nebakola obulumbaganyi obufiiriddemu abantu abawera Amuriat ategeezezza bannamawulire ku kitebe kye kibiina e Najjanankumbi nti bafunye amawulire nti eky’okubba ente mukitundu kye Karamoja bakifudde mulimu era n’ab’ebyokwerinda bakyenyigiddemu...

Kampuni ya Emmwaanyi Terimba akatale ekayingiridde mu maanyi. 
     Kampuni ya Buganda eyatandikiddwawo okusuubula emmwaanyi ku balimi n’okuzongerako omutindo eya Mwanyi Terimba Ltd, emirimu egitandikidde mu maanyi  Bano emirimu gy’okugula n’okusuubula emmwaanyi ku balimi bagitandise mu May 2022 nga webutuukidde olwa leero nga baakagula emmwaanyi eziwera ttani 200 era abagikulira bagamba nti eno ntandikwa nnungi...

Emmwaanyi ekwasa abamu obuggya naye mugirime musirike – Owek. Kyewalabye Male. 
     Minisita w’ Obwakabaka avunaanyizibwa ku lulimi Oluganda, ennono, Obuwangwa n’ebyobulambuzi awamu n’ebyokwerinda, Owek David Kyewalabye Male akunze abantu ba Buganda okusigala nga balima emmwaanyi wadde nga waliwo abamu abakwatirwa ekirime kino obuggya...

Omulangira Wasajja asabye abavubuka okwongera ku bitabo. 
     Omulangira David Kintu Wasajja asabye Abavubuka abalina omukisa okuddayo bongere ku bitabo bweba baagala okuvuganya ku katale k’ensi yonna ak’emirimu Okwogera bino Omulangira Wasajja abadde mu maka gw’ Omukungu Mukiibi Muzzanganda e Nasuuti mu kibuga Mukono ku mukolo gw’okwebaza Katonda asobozeseza abaana be abawera 9 okusoma nebafuna zi ddiguli mu masomo agenjawulo n’okuyingira amakaage...

Abantu ba Kabaka basabiddwa okulwanyisa obwavu.

Emmotoka ya Bobi Wine  empya yandigenda, Kkooti ekkiriza URA okuddamu okugyekebejja.

         Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga ategeezezza nti Obwakabaka bwakuddamu okugema abantu Lumiima mawuggwe (Corona) okwekikungo okusobola okutuula ekirwadde kino ku nfeete Bino Owek...

Beene aggaddewo empaka z’amasaza 2021, Buddu ye Nnantameggwa. 
       Essaza lya Kabaka ery’e Buddu lisitukidde mu kikopo ky’omwaka 2021 eky’omupiira gwa Masaza nga bano ekyafaayo kino baakikoledde mu maaso ga Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II bwe yalabiseeko okuggalawo empaka zino Bano okuwangula baazannye ne Buweekula ne bagiwangula ggoolo 2-0 mu kisaawe ekyabadde kikubyeko obugule ku St...

Ebikolwa bya kiwambabantu bigenda kuleetera abantu okwekyawa  –  Owek. Waggwa Nsibirwa. 
      Omumyuka Asooka owa Katikkiro, Owek Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa alabudde gavumenti ku bikolwa by’okuwamba abantu ebyeyongera buli lukya nti bino bisobola okuleetera bannansi okwekyaawa n’okwetamwa embeera nebakola ebitajja...

Enteekateeka z’olunaku lw’abajulizi zifulumye, Masaka yeetegeka. 
      Enteekateeka z’okujjukira olunaku lw’abajulizi zifulumye era nga Masaka yeddiziddwa omukisa okuddamu okutegeka okulamaga kw’omulundi guno oluvannyuma lw’emikolo gino obutabeerayo omwaka oguwedde olwa Ssennyiga Corona Kino kyabikkuddwa Omusumba w’essaza ly’Eklezia erya Masaka mu lukung’aana lwa bannamawulire lwe yatuuzizza e Kitovu, n’asaba abakkiriza okusabira ewaka ku ttivvi n’emitimbagano okusobola okwewala omujjuzo oguyinza okuvaako ekirwadde kya Corona okweyongera...

Omusango gwa Ssegiriinya ne Kidandala gwongezeddwayo, Ssegiriinya talabiseeko. 
     Okuwulira omusango oguvunaanibwa omubaka wa Kawempe North mu Palamenti eyawangula akalulu ka 2021, Muhammad Ssegiriinya mwatunkira n’eyali omumyuka wa Loodimmmeeya Sulaiman Kidandala gwongezeddwayo okutuuka nga September 2, 2021 oluvannyuma lwa Ssegiriinya obutalabikako mu kkooti Bw’abadde alabiseeko mu maaso g’omulamuzi wa kkooti enkulu, Henrietta Wolayo, munnamateeka w’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda Edwin Tabaro ategeezezza nti waliwo obwetaavu okusooka okukakasa oba Omubaka Ssegiriinya yaweebwa ebbaluwa eraga nti bamuguddeko omusango nga amateeka bwegalagira...

Museveni akirizza boda boda okukola okusukka ssaawa munaana. 
       Omukulembeze w’eggwanga Yoweri Kaguta Museveni akawungeezi kaleero akirizza abavuzi ba boda boda okugenda mu maaso n’emirimu gyabwe okusukka essaawa omunaana  Bwabadde ayogerako eri eggwanga mu maka g’obwapulezidenti e Nakasero, Museveni agambye nti akakiiko akakulirwa Ssaabaminisita Livingstone Ruhakana Rugunda kaamuwadde alipoota nti tekirina buzibu kukola okusukka ssaawa munaana...

Omulangira Nakibinge asabye Pulezidenti Museveni ayimbule abakwate. 
       Kampala Jjajja w’Obuyisiraamu, Omulangira Kassim Nakibinge, asabye Pulezidenti Museveni okuyimbula abaakwatibwa mu nsonga y’ebyobufuzi ng’akabonero akalaga obwetegefu okukolagana n’abo bwe baali bavuganya Omulangira Nakibinge, bino yabyogeredde  mu makaage e Kibuli ng’agabula abakulembeze ab’enjawulo ku kijjulo kya Eid- al -fitr n’abasaba okufaayo ennyo ku mbeera z’abantu...

Akakiiko k’ebyokulonda kagumizza Kyagulanyi ku by’okwerinda bye. 
      Kyambogo Ssentebe w’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda, Omulamuzi Simon Byabakama, agumiza munnakibiina kya National Unity Platform, Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (Bobi Wine), ng’akakiiko bwe kagenda okumukuuma asobole bulungi okunoonya akalulu ka 2021 Kyagulanyi Ssentamu ne mukyala we nga batuuka okwewandiisa Bino Byabakama abyogedde akwasa Kyagulanyi ne ttiimu ye, ttiimu y’abapoliisi egenda okukola ku by’okwerinda bye wamu n’omukwasa emmotoka gy’agenda okukozesa mu kalulu...

Ssaabaminisita wa Bungereza senyiga wa kolona amuyodde. 
     Ssaabaminisita wa Bungereza Boris Johnson  Ssaabaminisita w’eggwanga lya Bungereza Boris Johnson olwaleero ategeezezza ensi nti naye senyiga omukambwe owa Coronavirus amanyiddwa ennyo nga COVID-19 naye yabadde amuyodde  Olwaleero, Johnson agambye nti eggulo yabadde ayokerera wamu n’okuba ne senyiga ekyareetedde omusawo we okumulagira yeekebeze...

Bikaaye  : Abekalakaasa  67 e Jinja basindikiddwa ku alimanda. 
    Omulamuzi omukulu owa kkooti esookerwako e Jinja, Jude Okumu Muwone asindise abantu abawera 67 abakwatibwa nga beekalakaasa e Jinja okuwakanya ebbeeyi y’ebintu ku alimanda e Kirinya nga abalanga okwekalaasa mu ngeri emenya amateeka Bano ku alimanda batwaliddwayo ku Mmande nga bano bebamu ku bantyu abeetaba mu kwekalakaasa okwali e Bugembe, Mafubira ne Namulesa...

“Ekya aboopozisoni okuzira entuula za Palamenti tekijja kukosa ntambula ya mirimu”. 
      Minisita w’ebyamawulire n’okulung’amya eggwanga, Dr Chris Baryomunsi ategeezezza nga eky’ababaka ku ludda oluvuganya okwekandagga ne bafuluma Palamenti nti, tekirina ngeri yonna gye kigenda kutataaganyaamu mirimu gya Palamenti...

Ttiyaggaasi anyoose nga bagumbulula Barbie Kyagulanyi n’aba NUP. 
      Poliisi ekubye ttiyaggaasi n’amasasi okugumbulula Omukyala wa Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu, Barbie Kyagulanyi ne bannakibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP) e Nakaseke gye babadde batutte obuyambi eri abawala abazaala nga bakyali bato Bannakibiina kya NUP nga bakulembeddwamu Barbie Kyagulanyi, bakedde kwolekera ddwaliro lya Kikamulo Health Centre III e Nakaseke okuwaayo obuyambi nga bayitira mu kibiina kye ekya Caring Hearts Uganda nga poliisi tennabasalako...

Minisita Musenero bamutaddeko akakiiko kamunoonyerezeeko. 
     Palamaenti etaddewo akakiikko ak’enjawulo okunoonyereza ku Minsita wa Ssaayansi ne Tekinologiya kanoonyereze ku Minisita Monica Musenero ku ngeri gavumenti gy’ezze emuwaamu ensimbi ez’okukola eddagala erigema Ssennyiga Corona mu bukyamu so nga tewali kyamaanyi kyakoleddwa Kinajjukirwa nti okuva Ssennyiga corona lwe yalumba eggwanga,omukulembeze w’eggwanga azze ajuliza bannassaayansi ba kuno nga bwe bagenda okutandika okukola eddagala erigema Ssennyiga Corona n’ebirwadde ebirala, Uganda ekomye okulindanga abazungu...

COVID-19: Museveni Wakuddamu Okw’ogerako Eri Eggwanga. 
     Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni Kaguta  Ng’ekirwadde kya senyiga amanyiddwa nga COVID-19 kikyeyongera okweriisa enkuuli, Omukulembeze w’eggwanga Yoweri Kaguta Museveni wakuddamu okw’ogerako eri eggwanga olwaleero  Okusinziira ku Don Wanyama, omwogezi wa pulezidneti, Museveni wakw’ogerako eri eggwanga ku ssaawa bbiri ez’ekiro...

Aba UNAIDS basiimye obubaka bwa Ssaabasajja Kabaka bweyawadde mu kukuza olunaku lwa Bulungibwansi.. 
     UNAIDS esanyukidde obubaka bwa Kabaka bweyawadde mu kukuza olunaku lwa Bulungibwansi ne Gavumenti ez’ebitundu Oweek Dr Prosperous Nankindu  Minisita wa Kabaka ow’Ebyobulamu nga ali Sarah Nakku ne Angela Kateemu Nuwahereza okuva mu UNAIDS...

UPDF yeegaanye eby’okusibira aba NUP mu nkambi z’amagye. 
      Kampala Eggye ly’eggwanga erya Uganda People’s Defence Forces (UPDF), liwakanyizza ebyogerwa Pulezidenti wa National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (Bobi Wine), nti abamu ku bannakibiina abaakwatiddwa e Masaka, bakuumirwa mu nkambi y’amagye Abamu ku bammemba ba NUP nga batwalibwa ab’ebyokwerinda UPDF esabye Kyagulanyi agoberere amakubo amatuufu mu mateeka amanye ekituufu abantu be we bali aleme kuwabya ggwanga...

Obubonero bw’abeesimbyewo ku lwabwe tebutundibwa – Akakiiko k’ebyokulonda. 
     Kampala Akakiiko k’ebyokulonda kalabudde abantu abeesimbyewo ku lwabwe (Independents) okwewala ababasaba ssente nga babasuubiza okubawa obubonero bwe banaakozesa ku bukonge mu kalulu ka bonna aka 2021  Omwogezi w’akakiiko kano Paul Bukenya yagambye nti obubonero buno akakiiko kabugaba ku bwereere ng’omuntu asooka okubatuukirira gwe basooka okuwa akabonero k’ayagala...

Kkooti egobye ogwa People Power obutabeera mpandiise. 
       Kampala Kkooti etaputa Ssemateeka mu Kampala egobye omusango ogwali guwakanya ekisinde kya People Power ekikulirwa Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu aka Bobi Wine, okukolera mu ggwanga nga si kiwandiise mu mateeka agafuga ebibiina by’ebyobufuzi Leero ku Lwokubiri, abalamuzi 4 aba kkooti eno okuli; omumyuka wa Ssaabalamuzi Richard Buteera, Kenneth Kakuru, Catherine Bamugemereire ne Irene Mulyagonja, bategeezezza nti kkooti eno terina buyinza kuwulira musango nga guno era bwebatyo ne bagugoba...

Ssaabalamuzi Owiny-Dollo alabudde aba Kyagulanyi kukumutiisatiisa. 
      Kampala Ssaabalamuzi Alphonse Alphonse Owiny-Dollo alabudde enjuyi zombi mu musango oguwakanya obuwanguzi bwa Pulezidenti Museveni mu kalulu ka 2021 okukomya okutiisatiisa abalamuzi ba kkooti ensukkulumu  Ssabbiiti ewedde, ab’ekibiina kya National Unity Platform nga bakuliddwamu Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu batiisatiisa okuggyayo omusango gwabwe singa abalamuzi basatu be balumiriza okukolagana ne Museveni banaagulemeramu...

Baabano baminisita Museveni b’asudde n’alonda abapya. 
     Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Tibuhaburwa Museveni, kyaddaaki alangiridde kabineeti empya gy’agenda okukola nayo mu kisanja, kino erabise nga yeewuunyisizza bantu ab’enjawulo olw’abo abagirabikiddemu n’abo abasuuliddwa Olukalala luno olwafulumiziddwa eggulo ku Lwokubiri, omumyuka wa Pulezidenti Edward Kiwanuka Ssekandi abadde mu kifo kino okumala emyaka 10 y’omu ku basuuliddwa era ono yawangulwa ku bubaka bwa Palamenti bwa Bukoto Central...

Abantu 500 bokka be bayitiddwa okuziika Ssaabasumba Lwanga. 
      Kampala Enteekateeka z’okuziika Ssaabasumba wa Kampala, Dr Cyprian Kiziito Lwanga nga zigenda mu maaso, Ekereziya Katolika evuddeyo n’etegeeza nti abantu 500 bokka be bagenda okukkirizibwa okuziika era nti bano baamaze dda n’okutegeezebwa ku nteekateeka eno...

Bannayuganda basabiddwa okwetangira endwadde. 
      Bannayuganda basabiddwa okufaayo okwetangira endwadde ezitali zimu bweba baagala okulaakulana n’okukyuusa embeera yabwe olwo Buganda edde ku ntikko Okusaba kuno kukoleddwa Omulangira Felix Muteesa bw’abadde atikkula Amakula okuva mu bannassingo mu lubiri e Mmengo ku Lwokubiri...

Abatulugunya bannayuganda basabiddwa okwenenya mu kisiibo kino. 
      Kampala Bannaddiini ab’enjawulo basabye abavunaanyizibwa, okukomya embeera y’okukwata n’okutulugunya bannayuganda era beenenye mu kiseera kino ekya Kalema basobole okusonyibwa kuba kino kiseera kya kwagalana awamu n’okusonyibwa  Akulira abeesikoopi mu Ekleziya, Omusumba Anthony Zziwa, avumiridde ebikolwa by’okutulugunya bannayuganda era n’asaba abakola ebikolwa bino okudda eri Katonda mu kaseera kano...

Katikkiro Mayiga  akunze Bannabulemeezi okulima emmwaanyi, aggaddewo ekitundu ky’Emmwaanyi Terimba A. 
     Kamalabyonna Charles Peter Mayiga alambudde abalimi b’Emmwaanyi abasukkulumye mu ssaza Bulemeezi era nasaba n’abantu abalala okubalabirako bazirime bwebaba baagala okuwona obwavu n’okwekulaakulanya Obubaka buno Katikkiro Mayiga abuwadde alambula abalimi ab’enjawulo wansi w’enteekateeka y’Emmwaanyi Terimba neyeebaza Palamenti olw’okusimbira endagaano y’ Emmwaanyi ekkuuli...

Bobi Wine, Besigye  bayozaayozezza  Hichilema okuwangula obwapulezidenti bwe Zambia. 
       Bannabyabufuzi ku ludda oluvuganya mu ggwanga okuli; Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (Bobi Wine) ne Dr Kizza Besigye, basindise obubaka obuyozaayoz munnaabweHakainde Hichilemaeyawangudde obwapulezidenti bwa Zambia mu kulonda okwabaddewo ku Lwokuna...

Minisita Kyewalabye asiimye ababaka abaawakanyizza endagaano y’Emmwaanyi, asekeredde abagaana okujogerako. 
         MINISITA w’ebyobuwangwa, ennono n’obulambuzi mu Buganda, Owek David Kyewalabye Male asiimye obumu n’obuvumu,ababaka ba Palamenti bwe bataddewo okuwakanya endagaano y’ Emmwaanyi era nasekerera abakugira bannansi okujogerako...

Abawanguddwa ewalala balabuddwa obuteesimbawo mu NUP. 
      Mukono Abasunsula abeesimbyewo mu kibiina ki National Unity Platform (NUP) e Mukono, basabye bannabyabufuzi abawanguddwa mu bibiina ebirala obutasuubira kubawa Kkaadi ya NUP kuvuganya ku bifo bya bukulembeze mu Mukono Abamu ku bannakibiina ki NUP mu lukiiko   “Twakizudde nti, waliwo abawanguddwa mu Kamyufu ka NRM naye nga oli wano, twagala mukituyambeko nga olina obujulizi nga ono bamubalira nti afunye bbiri nga kati azze wano acankalanye buleete,” Akulira okusunsula kwa NUP e Mukono bweyagambye...

Abavubuka muyigire ku Sebaggala okwekkiririzaamu – Kasule Lumumba. 
     Ssaabawandiisi w’ekibiina kya National Resistance Movement (NRM), Kasule Lumumba, asabye abavubuka okutwala omugenzi Al- Hajji Nasser Ntege Sebaggala ng’ekyokulabirako kibayambe okwekkiririzaamu wamu n’okuggyayo obusobozi bwabwe Ssaabawandiisi Kasule Lumumba Lumumba ategeezezza bannamawulire ku Ssande ku kitebe ky’ekibiina mu Kampala, nga Sebaggala bw’abadde omusajja eyeerandiza yekka mu bukozi era ng’abadde akola emikwano okwetooloola ebitundu ebyenjawulo...

Abakung’aanya omusaayi basiimye Kabaka olw’okutumbula eby’obulamu. 
      Ebitongole ebyenjawulo ebivunaanyizibwa ku kukung’aanya omusaayi mu ggwanga okuli; Red cross ne Uganda blood Transfussion Services, bisiimye Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi n’ejjinja ery’omuwendo olw’eddimu ly’aliko ery’okutaasa abantu abeetaaga omusaayi ng’ayitira mu kitongole kye ekya Kabaka Foundation Bano ejjinja lino balikwasizza Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga ku Lwokusatu mu Bulange e Mmengo ne bamusaba abatuusize okusiima kwabwe ewa Ssaabasajja Kabaka...

Poliisi erabudde abaagala okwerayiza; kuba kulya mu nsi lukwe. 
       Kampala Poliisi erabudde omuntu yenna atagese okwerayiza, okwetabamu oba okulaga amawulire agalaga omuntu omulala yenna nga yeerayiza nti ajja kuba alidde mu nsi olukwe Leero, omwogezi wa poliisi Fred Enanga ategeezezza olukiiko lwa bannamawulire olutudde e Nagulu nti bafunye amawulire ng’abamu ku baavuganya mu kalulu kaggwa,  bwe bategese okwerayiza...

Minisita Bwanika asabye abantu okujjumbira okugaba omusaayi. 
     Minisita wa gavumenti ez’ebitundu era Ssaabawolereza w’Obwakabaka, Owek Christopher Bwanika, asabye abantu bakabaka okujjumbira enteekateeka ya Ssaabasajja Kabaka ey’okugaba omusaayi basobole okutaasa obulamu bw’abo abagwetaaga okuli abakyala abazaala, abagudde ku bubenje n’abantu abalina endwadde enzibu nga Nnalubiri...

Eyavuganya  ky’omubaka wa Tororo bamusibye emyaka 50 lwa kutta muntu. 
     Kkooti enkulu e Tororo esindise eyavuganyaako ku bubaka bwa Tororo North mu nkomyo okumala emyaka 50 oluvannyuma lw’okusingisibwa omusango gw’okutemula eyali omuwandiisi w’ekibiina kya NRM mu kitundu ekyo mu kamyufu k’ekibiina akaaliwo mu mwaka 2020 Akalulu ka NRM mukitundu kino kaalimu ebbugumu n’emivuyo egiwerako era gyebyagwera nga Oketcho Sinambio eyali omuwandiisi w’ekibiina mu ggombolola ye Mukuju attiddwa...

Minisita Kakomo atongozza emmerezo y’emmwanyi mu Buddu. 
     Minisita omubeezi avunaanyizibwa ku by’obulimi, obulunzi, obusuubuzi n’obwgassi mu Buganda, Owek Hajji Amis Mukasa Kakomo akunze bannabuddu okuddamu balime emmwanyi nga bwe gwali emabegako, kibayambe okuva mu bwavu wamu n’okukulaakulanya Buganda...

Cheptegei  amenye likodi y’ensi yonna, awangudde Zzaabu. 
       Omuddusi w’emisinde Joshua Kiprui Cheptegei, ekiro ky’eggulo yamenyewo likodi y’ensi yonna mu misinde gya mmita 5000 bwatyo nawangulira Uganda omuddaali gwa Zzaabu mu mpaka za 2020 Diamond League ezibadde e Monaco mu Bufalansa Emisinde gino Cheptegei yagiddukidde eddakiika 12:35...

Obwakabaka buzizza buggya omukago gwabwo ne Uganda Breweries.

Oweek. Kaawaase agamba Obwavu obuli mu Buganda tebusosola. 
      Oweek Kaawaase ne Boodi ya BUCADEF empya  Bulange Omumyuka Asooka owa Katikkiro Prof...

Ow’emyaka 14 Alina Akawuka Ka Siriimu Alemedde Mu Ddwaliro Ly’e Kiwoko.

Bakansala ba KCCA baakulonda sipiika ku Lwokuna. 
     Minisita wa Kampala Betty Amongi  Ekitongole ekiddukanya ekibuga Kampala ekya Kampala Capital City Authority ku Lwokuna wiiki eno kyakufuna sipiika n’omumyukawe Minisita mu gavumenti yawakati atwala KCCA Betty Amongi ategeezezza bannamawulire ku kitebe kyessunsuliro ly’amawulire ga gavumenti ekya Uganda Media Center, nti enteekateeka y’okufuna sipiika etandika ku saawa ssatu ez’okumakya...

Owek. Nkalubo asabye abalima emmwaanyi bagatteko obulunzi. 
     Minisita avunaanyizibwa ku bulimi, obulunzi n’obutonde bwensi, Owek Mariam Mayanja Nkalubo Nasejje awadde abantu ba Kabaka amagezi obulimi bw’emmwaanyi babugatteko obulunzi kuba eno y’engeri yokka esoboka okubaganyula...
